CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL(OrderItem__r.Contract__r.Status, "Activated")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(OrderItem__r.Contract__r.Status, "Pending")),
AND( NOT(ISBLANK(OrderItem__r.Contract__r.Contract_Termination_Date__c)), OrderItem__r.Contract__r.Contract_Termination_Date__c < TODAY() ),
AND( NOT(ISBLANK(OrderItem__r.Contract__r.EndDate)), OrderItem__r.Contract__r.EndDate < End_date__c ),
AND( NOT(ISBLANK(OrderItem__r.Contract__r.StartDate)), OrderItem__r.Contract__r.StartDate > Start_date__c ),
NOT(ISPICKVAL(OrderItem__r.Approval_Status__c, "Activated")),
AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(OrderItem__r.Change_Action_Type__c, "Removed"), ISPICKVAL(OrderItem__r.Change_Action_Type__c, "Changed") ), NOT(ISBLANK(OrderItem__r.Change_Action_Effective_End_Date__c)), OrderItem__r.Change_Action_Effective_End_Date__c < End_date__c ),
OR( Start_date__c < DATEVALUE(OrderItem__r.Start_Date_Time__c), End_date__c > DATEVALUE(OrderItem__r.End_Date_Time__c) ) ), "Deactivated", "Active" )
CustomField.label: Status
